channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
I'm using Delta.
1. How can I make it so the teleports that I want are all blue, not gray. Like for the Varrock teleport ("V" button on magic book), I want it to be blue all the time even if I don't have the runes required).
2. How can I make it so when a new player arrived on my server, they can see all places by travelling each village (HD) and a NPC explain them everything about my server.
Thanks.

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

Thanks, it worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I Vain I:

Tom’s Cache Suite

Okay. Downloaded it.

Now, I found the images in the caches. I just change the “MagicOn” images to “MagicOff” images to display my teleports ?

How do I edit the images in it ?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]The images load through the cache, and I can give you a download for all the magic icons.

As for the method, I’d not sure.

It’d be easier to redo them in the cache.[/quote]

I can’t redo them in the cache because the files in my caches for my client can’t be edited. The codes in the files are weird and it’s like a .class file.

How can I do it then ?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]It’s called a CutScene, or called a CutScreen.
It’s a small video-type walkthrough, showing important/key aspects of the game.

I’m not sure if their are tutorials out for it yet, but it is possible to do.[/quote]

Okay thanks.

For the other question, I tried to find a MagicOn image for my Varrock teleport and there’s no image.

What’s the method for MagicOn / MagicOff so I can display my teleports on MagicOn all time ?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]1: Replace the sprites, so that the MagicOff image, is the same as MagicOn.
Or, change the loading method for it, to display it as MagicOn all the time.

2: CutScene/CutScreen.[/quote]

Thanks !

What do you mean for the second question though?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

I’m using Delta.

  1. How can I make it so the teleports that I want are all blue, not gray. Like for the Varrock teleport (“V” button on magic book), I want it to be blue all the time even if I don’t have the runes required).

  2. How can I make it so when a new player arrived on my server, they can see all places by travelling each village (HD) and a NPC explain them everything about my server.

Thanks.
